p: In fact, a much lower prevalence of COVID-19 is observed in children than in adults, with people under 18 years accounting for only 5% of cases in the USA compared to 22% in the total population ( Prevention CfDCa, 2020b). Of 1412 Chinese children with infection, 4% and 51% were categorized as asymptomatic and mild, respectively ( Dong et al., 2020).
